title: Inquiry-Based Language Curriculum Design and Implementation Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic language structures and digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Blended course aiming to strengthen language learners' inquiry skills in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments. Focuses on cultivating practical language proficiency required in professional settings

learning_goals: Learners can design and implement inquiry projects analyzing real-world language usage scenarios
Learners can derive context-appropriate communication strategies by comparatively analyzing diverse linguistic materials
Learners can systematically document and share language inquiry processes using digital tools (e.g., smartphone apps)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
